name: Send an Email to Customers When Their Tracktor Package is "In Transit"
description: Keeping customers up to date on their order is key to avoiding the dreaded “where is my package?” question. When you combine Mesa with Tracktor, you can set up a workflow that automatically sends an email to customers when their package is in transit. It’s going to give them peace of mind as they continue to wait for their order.
